plot: Cutey Honey is an android created by Prof. Kisaragi. Within her is the 'Fixed System of Air Elements', a device that can create anything out of air. The evil organization Panther Claw desires this device. While trying to steal it, they kill Prof. Kisaragi. Now furious, Honey makes a vow to get revenge, and destory the Panther Claw.
opening_theme: "Cutey Honey" (キューティーハニー) by Yoko Maekawa
ending_theme: "Yogiri no Honey (夜霧のハニー; Honey of Night Fog)" by Yoko Maekawa
